text: «Bone wonanii on, yo faasiqiiɓe, ɗun ko onon jannooɓe fii Sariya on e Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen, ɓay hiɗon ittana naana e suukooran e ɲamaku farilla, hara hiɗon welsindanii ko ɓuri hittude kon ka Sariya, ɗun ko peewal ngal e yurmeende nden e sella-findeyaagal ngal. Hara-le ko ɗun haanunoɗon jokkude, tawa kadi on welsindaaki e ko heddii kon.
